profile_summary:
As a proficient Senior Process Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in process automation and orchestration using key technologies such as **Power Automate**, **Power Apps**, and **UiPath**. My solid expertise encompasses handling **APIs REST**, **APIs SOAP**, and **Webhooks** for seamless integration, alongside a robust proficiency in **Python**, **JavaScript**, and utilizing **PowerShell** for scripting tasks.

I have demonstrated a strong ability to implement business process management (BPM) solutions, employing **BPMN** and **UML** methodologies. My project management experience includes agile practices with **Scrum** and **Kanban**, utilizing tools like **JIRA** and **Confluence** within **Azure DevOps** environments to ensure effective workflow and team collaboration.

In addition to my process engineering skills, I possess a solid foundation in full-stack development with **FastAPI**, **Django**, **React**, and **Next.js**. I've led initiatives that not only enhanced operational resilience but also ensured compliance with industry standards. As a forward thinker, I integrate modern technologies, including **Microsoft Copilot** and **ChatGPT**, to leverage AI capabilities for intelligent automation and improved decision-making processes.
